title: Best of British: Rolls Royce
subject_group: Communications, Infrastructure, & Transport/Automobile industry and trade
Communications, Infrastructure, & Transport/Automobiles - Design and construction
Agriculture, Business, Commerce & Industry/Automobile industry and trade
description: Episode of Series "Best of British". This documentary on the world's most prestigious car maker, features all the significant Rolls-Royce models from the earliest Silver Ghost and classic Phantoms to the latest Silver Spirit and Flying Spur. A high percentage of all the Roll-Royces ever made are still in existence. Unique footage from the factory shows how the company applies the tradition and standards of almost 90 years of car manufacture to today's technology.
related_objects: Series; S01319; Best of British; Active; 1996
